author: charles
msg: Transfer responsibility for adding users from RemoteManager to MailServer, enabling associated tasks, such as creation of access control lists in due course. No practical change in short term.

author: serge
msg: Forgot to add SQL scripts for mysql and sqlserver.

author: serge
msg: Added first database implementation of Mail/Spool Repository.  Uses Town for database access.  Included a few SQL scripts to create table (for different databases) and sample database connection definition files.  Wrote howto docs file.  Also considated AvalonMailRepository to implement both mail and spool repository, removing redundant class.
Works as mail spooler (mail and spool repositories) and POP3 account message storage.

author: charles
msg: First draft of skeleton for an IMAP server, mainly interfaces

author: charles
msg: Housekeeping - mail repository proposal incorporated into main tree.
